quote.text: You don’t have to shrink to be loved. Take up space, speak with grace, and dare to be unforgettable.
quote.author: Alex Elle

scripture.text: Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God.

message:
Ms Sunshine ☀️💗

Your smile is not just beautiful.... it's healing...It’s the kind of thing that could shift a whole room, lift a heavy heart, or make someone believe in gentleness again.

That’s why I always tell you I hope you smile each day...because your smile is proof that you’re still choosing To show it in a hard world. And that means everything.

I think the world is better just because you're in it..

Your smile reminds me that beauty isn’t about perfection... it's about presence. It’s the echo of your spirit speaking before your words even do.

Never let the world steal that Smile... Never forget what your smile means..to me, and to this world.

You mean the world to me. And I’m proud of you. Always.💗
